verbs.description: * [ARG0: North Korea] to [V: get] [ARG1: security] [ARGM-PRP: in exchange for denuclearization] . At a news conference after the historic meeting with Kim in Singapore , Trump announced he would halt what he called " very provocative " and expensive regular military exercises that the United States stages with South Korea . North Korea has long sought an end to the war games .
